text:
Paddy procurement centres will be opened at six places in the district on Monday, according to the Collector T.P. Rajesh.

They would be functioning at Sukkaliyur, Chinna Dharapuram, Nachalur, Kovakulam, Pallapalayam and Kattalai. The paddy procurement price to the farmers would be credited thorough Electronic Clearing System, he said.
title: Six DPCs to be opened
